name: Increase by 2
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-5-task-1.png)

Create a `count` variable and assign it a value of 100.

```javascript
let count = 100;
```

Then write a command that increments the existing value of the `count` variable by 2.
To do this, type the command:
```javascript
count = count + 2;
```

The total should end up like this:
```javascript
let count = 100;
count = count + 2;
```
